docs.lead_paragraph:
A growing number of anti-abortion activists, despite
social-science research, claim that women are
traumatized by their abortions — and are trying to use
this to reframe the abortion debate.

headline.print_headline: Study on Nicotine Levels Stirs Calls for New Controls
headline.main: Study on Nicotine Levels Stirs Calls for New Controls

docs.lead_paragraph: A Harvard study concluding that cigarette makers have for years deliberately increased nicotine levels in cigarettes led to renewed calls for greater federal oversight.
docs.snippet: A Harvard study concluding that cigarette makers have for years deliberately increased nicotine levels in cigarettes led to renewed calls for greater federal oversight.
